body.name: Travel Steamer for Clothes,Handheld Portable Garment Steamer,0.75lbs Lightly,15s Fast Heat-up,10min Continuous Steam,Mini Steam Iron for Any Fabrics, No Water Spitting, 120V
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 14 mins
features: QUICK & EASY TO USE: Effortlessly eliminate wrinkles with a powerful 900W steam generator that heats up in just 15 seconds! You'll save time and have your clothes looking fresh and wrinkle-free in no time.

LIGHTWEIGHT & LONG-LASTING: Travel light without sacrificing functionality. Our steamer weighs only 0.75lbs - that's as light as two smartphones combined! And with over 8 minutes of continuous steam time, you'll be able to steam multiple garments in one go!
STAIN-FREE STEAMING: Never worry about water spots on your clothes again! Our steamer uses advanced technology to ensure that no water is left behind on any type of fabric.
SUITABLE FOR ALL FABRICS: One steamer for all fabrics! Our triple heating technology and NTC constant temperature chip create high-density, deep-penetrating steam that suits all types of fabrics.

WHAT YOU GET: With your purchase, you'll receive a garment steamer, flannel storage bag, user manual, and our worry-free 365 days warranty. And if you have any questions at all, our friendly customer service team is here to help!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: New Lightweight Garment Steamer with Stylish Design Effortlessly Smooth Out Wrinkles On-The-Go with Our Portable Steamer Upgrade your steaming game with AOPUTO's new lightweight garment steamer that combines style and functionality in one. Portable: Weighing only 1.5lbs, this steamer is perfect for both home and travel use.Slim: 9.1X2.6X1.65inches, easy to holdFast:15s Fast Heat-upLeak-proof: Never worry about water leaking with this steamer.Adaptable: Can be used for both hanging and flat ironing.Convenient: The 6ft power cord provides ample length and flexibility for easy use.

Efficient heating technology A three-layer heating principle ensures that the water is thoroughly heated, providing you with stable and lasting steam output. Clothes are instantly smoothed, refreshed, and rejuvenated. Transparent 70+ Water Tank, Continuous Steaming for Long Duration This steam iron is equipped with a transparent water tank of 70+, enabling you to have a clear view of the water level. It provides continuous and efficient steaming for approximately 10 minutes, ensuring a seamless and efficient ironing experience. One-Button Activation for Effortless Ironing This steam iron is equipped with a simple one-button activation feature, making your ironing experience effortless and hassle-free. Convenient 6ft Long Power Cord for Flexible Use The steam iron comes with a generous 6ft long power cord, ensuring flexibility and convenience during usage. Enjoy the freedom to maneuver effortlessly around your workstation without being limited by cord length.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best travel steamer
reviews.reviewText: Week 1: First Impressions of Aoputo Travel SteamerI recently acquired the Aoputo Travel Steamer, and let me tell you, it's been a game-changer for my on-the-go lifestyle. The promise of a 15-second heat-up time is no exaggeration; this little powerhouse is ready to smooth out wrinkles almost instantly. Its steam generator is impressively efficient, making my morning routine travel a breeze.It's lightweight design is a major plus, especially when traveling. At 0.75lbs, it's about the same weight as my celllphone, and the compact size fits seamlessly into my suitcase. I've already noticed a significant difference in my packing – no more lugging around a heavy iron or dealing with wrinkled clothes after a long flight.Week 2: Seamless Steaming ExperienceThis travel steamer continues to exceed my expectations. The 10 minutes of continuous steam is a real game-changer (set a 10 min on my iphone). During a recent trip to South America, where outlets can differ, either pick a hotel with american outlets or bring your adaptor. But I didn't have to worry, I picked a hotel where I was able to use it instantly.What I really love about this steamer is its stain-free steaming feature. I don't get more water spots on my clothes – a common issue with other steamers that I bought from Target and Amazon. It's advanced technology lives up to its promise, leaving every fabric spotless and ready to wear.Week 3: A Steamer for Every FabricAs someone who owns a variety of fabrics, I'm thrilled that the Aoputo Travel Steamer is suitable for all of them. It worked great on my delicate silks and cotton. It's truly a one-size-fits-all solution.The package also comes with a thoughtful flannel storage bag, making it easy to keep everything organized. It has become an essential part of my daily routine, both at home and abroad. Its quick heat-up time, lightweight design, and versatility across fabrics make it a must-have for anyone who values efficiency and convenience in their clothing care routine. Whether you're a frequent traveler like me or simply want a reliable steamer at home, this one checks all the boxes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO much easier than ironing
reviews.reviewText: This little steamer is very convenient and came with a storage bag and easy instructions. To me, ironing is the biggest hassle, so I was happy to try an alternate method. I have a larger garment steamer, but it involves some setup and can't really be used quickly.I found my most wrinkled shirt and tried it out. I hung the shirt on the door and steamed it right there. The steamer was easy to use and heated up immediately. It took the wrinkles out quickly and didn't make the fabric wet. It would be difficult to make purposeful creases if they weren't already there, but I didn't need that. For the purpose of removing closet wrinkles before work or touching up clothes that were hung out to dry, this little steamer absolutely fits the bill.The only drawback I can see is to put it down, you have to lay it on its side. When I picked it back up, a few drops of hot water spurted out - I know now to be careful of that. I may have to devise some kind of stand so I can set it down for a second to arrange the clothes.Overall, this steamer is easy and effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small for travel
reviews.reviewText: The steamer is small and is shipped with a carrying bag which is convenient for travel packing. Because it is designed for travel, it is not efficient for everyday use to de-wrinkle your clothes, but it is good to have it with you when traveling. It gas a look of sleek modern and feels comfortable to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a student on the go
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR Easy to use, heats quickly, serves my purposes but doesn't last long enough for a full load of clothesAs a student, this has saved me a lot of time in ensuring my business casual or professional clothes are presentable. I certainly don't have time to actually iron all my clothes and this was an excellent compromise. Very straightforward and easy to use. Heats up faster than I expected (beware) given how lightweight it is. It's slim enough that it's easy to slip in between sleeves or folds, which is not true for some steam irons I have had in the past (seriously, why do they come shield shaped?). This one doesn't last that long in my opinion, though. Since I'm rapidly using this on a few delicately washed outfits at a time, I don't particularly care, but keep in mind that I would be surprised if you could get through an entire dryer's load of clothes with this in one go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke Upon First Use
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately this broke on the first use. Specifically the water chamber cracked, water was spilling everywhere & was unusable. Would love for it to work, because the design, lightness, & compactness is so lovely. Thank you for receiving this feedback.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, powerful and convenient
reviews.reviewText: This unit is small and convenient. I keep it in my walk-in closet in the bedroom so I can steam my crinkled clothes I wanna wear “now” quickly in my closet. This way, I don’t have to go all the way to my laundry room where my iron and ironing board are. This steamer is so powerful that it quickly smoothes out the wrinkles on my clothes every single time. I can also take it with me when traveling. It is smaller than my hair iron! Highly recommended for busy people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: The size and weight of the product are convenient and make it easy to use and definitely easy to travel with. It works quickly as well which is nice to see. You don't have to wait long for the product to heat up and start doing it's job. Overall, I like the product. My wife travels a lot for work and I got this for her. We did some testing when we got it the other day and seems to work well and as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Only worked a total of 4 times
reviews.reviewText: Broke after 4 months and company is not responding for repair or replacement
